snippet.title: Undead West - Official Developer Overview Trailer | The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Join lead developer Alex Bartlett of Deathless Games for a deep dive into Undead West, an upcoming top-down twin-stick shooter game. Bartlett discusses what you can expect from this game, like unlocking items and their purpose, and we get a look at gameplay. Undead West will be available on PC. Undead West throws you into a roguelite bullet hell with a western twist. Resurrected by Death, your quest for revenge incurs a soul debt, unlocking new weapons and whiskey boons with every defeated adversary. Navigate hazard-filled landscapes, face demons and skeletons, and confront ominous bosses, including the Man in Red. Shoot, dodge, and unlock weapons to get your revenge.
